1.title: Hundeherz
1.plot: Dr. Philip Hansen and his wife agreed to move from Hamburg to Black Forest small town Waldau, but their 'uprooted' kids doubt if the countryside is better to grow up without urban comforts. Mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber reneged on his promise to welcome them, grumbling the new vet won't be what the village needs, but his wife sends junior son Jonas over with the key -without they were locked out) and a cake, which gets spoiled on the tractor. Vinzenz plans to put down aged hunting dog Oswald, but firstborn Jakob warns Jonas in time to hide the dog, and his new classmate, ...

4.title: Schafskälte
4.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Schlangenbeschwörer
5.plot: The cool kids make fun in class of shy Paul Baumann when he presents his unusual pet as a harmless python, an heirloom form his father. When he brings it in for a checkup, Dr. Philip Hansen finds it's alas its lethal lookalike, the green mamba, but fearing to have it confiscated, the boy sneaks out, bumps into Jonas and so the serpent escapes. Mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber mobilizes the fire department, whose only major contribution proves the truck.

6.title: Dickhäuter
6.plot: All Waldau is excited by the arrival of a small circus. Its star attraction is the elephant Savadi, while director Malafosse's son, acrobat Toni, quickly makes friends among his amused temporary classmates as born entertainer. Dr. Philip Hansen inspects the animal and finds indications its condition is unacceptable, so he bans it performing. The villagers are furious, the kids mount a campaign to feed the colossus, but the next morning it seems left behind in a pasture.

7.title: Bocksprünge
7.plot: Classmates Luca and Cem drag Jonas along in a dare-based Boys-girls competition in bravery, which goes badly for them due to bad luck and cheating. Luca gets obsessed with the 'ultimate challenge', cutting the billy-goat's beard at Jonas's farm, but each in term is battered by the beast, which ends up getting wounded and loose, causing a lot of damage. Desperate for social acceptation, Annette joins the all to rustic local straw sculpture competition, on Josefine Grieshaber multiple-winners team.

8.title: Poltergeist
8.plot: The Hansen parents dismiss the children's claim to hear a ghost in the attic, and aren't told when the culprit is found and hidden: a wild raccoon, who aptly steals all over the village, hence must be locked out. Dr. Philip Hansen promised to discharge his wife by hiring an actual practice assistant, but airhead intern Emma proves as useless as scared of animals. The news of a feral rogue inspires mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber to set a trap, but only Jonas's pants get caught in it.

9.title: Waldläufer
9.plot: Wandering in the Black Forest, the kids spot a roe deer. Playing Hobbits patrol, the boys try their slings on it, Jonas accidentally wounds it. His father Vinzent wants the doe eliminated as it eats his Christmas tree saplings, yet he hates hurting wildlife. Dr. Philip Hansen is caught between fires, as his daughter brings the doe in for help, but the mayor is qualified as municipal huntsman to control and cull problematic game. Jonas's big brother Jacob not only unilaterally invited his girl friend on a fugue, Janine also brought the pet her own folks wouldn't accept...

10.title: Katzenjammer
10.plot: While the kids go swimming in a forest pool on a glorious day, they spot a man who throws a bag from his man, which as they feared contains two live kittens. Diving saves only one thanks to doc Hansen, and team Jonas resolves to track down all possible suspects, even not-amused Cem's father plumber Akcay, who proves as innocent as 'cat man' Schott. Focussing on scrap metal dealer and handyman Kolschewsky, the order him instead of the Hansens to repair the pipes Annette foolishly attempted to fix herself. Near-blind crone Niehthammer loses her beloved cat, yet maybe ...

11.title: Turteltauben
11.plot: Jonas wonders -so it's not him- who sends Greta romantic messages by pigeon, unlike his mates Luka and Cem, not amused his mother stupidly forces them to allow nerd Paul to tag along. The shake him off cycling fast to the local ruin, where he catches up and is told joining their gang requires a courage hazing test: walking a dauntingly-high beam. Greta can't find out who sent the pigeon, but gets a message to meet her admirer- it's four-eyes Paul, who gets scared off by Jonas, and needs his bird to call for help after falling off the beam practicing on his own.

12.title: Pferdestärken
12.plot: Jonas invited Great to admire the drought horse doing the heavy forestry lifting, but his father Vinzenz Grieshaber is tired of being ridiculed as outdated by forester Springmann and borrowed his machine, which he operates, only to end up with his leg caught under a heavy tree. He'll be lucky if the kids can get help from a local and the vet. Annette finally gets a restoration commission, a saint's statue in Waldau curate Hummel's church, but the walls are vandalized by kid daughter Lilie who was hastily left to be babysat by Greta, who believed to by her quiet with ...

13.title: Schwein gehabt
13.plot: Mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber's usually hosts the annual town pig breeding contest and wins it, but now his prize swine is missing, so he can't even make the opening. His prime suspect is Greta, who actually welcomed another porcine, but even Jonas refuses to talk to the apparent farm saboteur, yet saves her bacon. Dr. Hansen should rest with flu, but finds the cash for his medication s-was spent on the piglet, which mother now tries to sell to a 'good home'. First-time contender Schäuffele and grumpy farmer Merz's dodgy practices are found out.

1.title: Der Wolf kommt
1.plot: Nobody believes 'snake boy' Paul Baumann reporting he spotted the first wolf in Waldau since over a century. Jonas changes his tune after finding a fatally bitten sheep in the same Black Forest section, adults divide in believers and mockers, but doc Hansen concludes it's true. Hunters set out, parents worry for their hiking children. A mystery man gets hold of the wolf.

2.title: Kleiner Tierfeind
2.plot: As mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber's farm isn't earning enough, his wife Josefine advertised a room with board. City-dweller Schünzel arrives from Düsseldorf with his spoiled wife Marion, who abhors rustic food, and gaming-addicted teen son Quirin-Emanuel. Jonas is supposed to show him around o the farm, but abhorred to find his guest a sadist to animals, like new-born the steer-calf. Desperate about collect bills with the vet's local scrooge clients, Annette Hansen secretly caters for the tourists, but falls into a trip Jonas had set for Quirin, who finds her but is all but...

3.title: Reiterfreuden
3.plot: While the girl riding students bicker endlessly before and during their test at the Götz stud farm, a favorite horse gets a dangerous colic. Jonas is brought in to search for toxic food, but devoted stable-hand Bertus eagerly and ably assists vet Philip Hansen diagnosing the psychosomatic truth, an overdue lesson for the bitching brats.

4.title: Hundefänger
4.plot: When young stable-hand Bertus brings in his ferret for veterinary help and ably assists, Dr. Hansen makes him an eagerly accepted offer to become his trainee assistant, lessening his wife's workload so she can install a workshop for her minor restorations job in the barn. Jonas's gang hears of missing cats and dogs and sets chase to suspects textile hamper vans, including the year-back cool skater Timo, but arriving at the firm need help from Bertus to get in, and from doc to clear up what really happens.

5.title: Kopf in den Sand
5.plot: Timo makes fun of Paul who presents in class his pet, a green snake from his late father. Later he brings it to the surgery, where doc Hansen is horrified to find it's not a harmless python lookalike of the green mamba as he thought, but the lethal real thing. When unsuspecting Jonas arrives with dog Oswald, the box falls and the venom escapes, causing panic throughout the village. Before it's caught, the Hansen dog gets bitten.

6.title: Zugvögel
6.plot: Jonas can just deal with the inconvenience and insecurity when the household and farm must do with him and father Vinzent, after his mother 'moves back to her parents' indefinitely after grandma made a fall, but unsolicited female 'sympathy' and speculations about a wrecked marriage are too much. Meanwhile Greta neglects school worrying about a goose that couldn't keep up with the migrating flock, which doc diagnoses just gastroenteritis, and marvels with Jonas at a gander who drops by searching for its mate for life.

7.title: Freches Frettchen
7.plot: Dr. Hansen is very pleased with his animals-devoted orphan assistant Bertie Heckenbichler, who even volunteers to help out as scooter driver when doc's car breaks down, but puzzled about his erratic behavior and utter mess I the surgery I the morning. He ignores it's because of Bertie's smuggled-in pet, a tame ferret. Since they had to leave the stud farm, Fred can't chase rodents there and bites things, like car motor belts. It escapes and gets sneakily taken in by the girls, but ends up killing a pet bunny. Doc has mixed feelings about flirtatious antiques hunter ...

8.title: Spielplatzterror
8.plot: Ex-con local adolescent Micha Moser trained his demented grandma's rottweiler for dog fights and terrorizes the school kids. Beig his age, Bertie is pressed by the kids to trap him into revealing the secret location of the illegal arena by pretending he trained the Hansen dog pretzel, a cute pooch, and wants to fight with him. Grumpy farmer Bischek, the vet practice's worst debtor, would rather delay therapy then pay up, but seeing Annette restores an old cuckoo clock, offers another deal: paying in antique kind, unaware his clock was his father's secret hiding lace ...

9.title: Bienenstich
9.plot: Veterinarian Dr. Philip Hansen learns from the desperation of the local beekeeper when one bee stung his naughty daughter. The real worry is to diagnose and hopefully cure the hive, as the children are taught how useful, even needed, the champion pollinators are for both wildlife and agriculture.

10.title: Wie die Wildsau
10.plot: After initial disbelief of a teen sighting a wild boar in Waldau forest, panic spreads when it's confirmed and it even wounds the leg of Viktor Stelzl, the gentleman cavalier of grandma Almut. She's motivated to meddle even worse in the family of her daughter Annette and even Dr. Hansen's practice, but that doesn't stop Greta sneaking out to 'save the poor wildlife' which is the official target of mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber and forester Karl Nachtweyh's hunting parties, including the boys.

11.title: Affenschande
11.plot: Waldau charmed by peddler Famula but divided about his naughty monkey, who is mainly kept in a tiny cage. While kids campaign to see the animal liberated, it becomes clear the recent wave of thefts may not be the work of poor orphan Bertie, whom doc suspects after finding missing cash in his lab coat, but rather fits the movements of Famula. Yet when they track him down to a ruin camp, his motives and attitude prove less then criminal.

12.title: Höhlenangst
12.plot: It's hard to take serious the sighting of something resembling the forest devil' from local legend, which masks are modeled after, as worn for fun by Jonas. His Turkish classmate Cem is only interested in Greta's visiting Hamburg buddy, fashionista Chiara Eckhoff. But when the Hansen pet dog Prtezel gets missing, the girls go look for him and think the sight the devil near an old mine shaft he fell down, getting in trouble themselves. The men and boys must search and rescue them.

13.title: Vampire
13.plot: Shortly before Halloween, Waldau's leading contractor Alois Brackmann hires Annette to remodel the semi-ruin known to kids as the ghost house after his crew demolish half. But kids entering it on a dare are scared by 'vampires', rendered credible by a bloodily wounded horse in the stud farm. With Doc's help, it's established the house is inhabited by bats, a protected species, but not vampires, the horse blood has a more prosaic cause.

1.title: Königin der Tiere
1.plot: Roy Freitag returns to Waldau after years of shady dealings abroad. Hearing a roar from his home, Jonas and Greta warn he must be holding a lion, but their fathers, mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber, who eagerly welcomes another businessman, and vet Dirk, who is shown only inanimate items and a jungle sounds CD, aren't easily convinced. Mother Hansen agreed unilaterally to invite her just-fired junior sister architect Nelly Spieker to move in 'for now' with her daughter Celine.

2.title: Kleiner Hund, was nun?
2.plot: Carpenter Tomasz Kulka's pre-teen son Pawel 'Pavo' is caught 'tresspassing' and angling in a local brook by Nelly, but they bond, also over her dog dog Cookie. The kids help search for a missing pooch, who is found, having been accidentally run off the road in the dark by Thmoasz's truck. After she takes the blame for the 'poaching', Tomasz is also grateful for helping his rascal Pavo and rewards the family with a handcrafted doghouse.

3.title: Komischer Kauz
3.plot: Only Pawel and her klutzy nerd class neighbor Gustav Ott truly welcome Susanne's fresh daughter Nelly, bully Ben Armbruster joins the hostile fashionista gang. Having spotted an owl which was probably chased from the Hansen house during its makeover, team Pawel remodels a rundown cabin, but Ben's gang seizes it at night, only to face an angry, scary-looking bird of prey.

4.title: Party Animals
4.plot: All the kids are invited in Werner Elsässer's grand villa for the lavish birthday party he throws for his spoiled daughter. The fashionable shiatsu she gets as gift but can't appreciate is rapidly handed to a younger girl, nobody notices it's utterly neglected. When it's found missing, baseless accusations follow quickly, yet Pawel, Nelly and Cookie spare no effort to search for the truth, even if that means betraying their secret tree house, which the land owner fortunately commends them for fixing on their own. The truth prevails.

5.title: Die Bananenspinne
5.plot: A South-American bird spider (tarantula) arrived in a fruit crate in Germany, notably with Bertie's healthy desert bananas. Once it's spotted in town, panic spreads over Walldau while the creepy critter sneakily creeps around, hiding even in the vet's car. Hansen has a hard time assuring locals it's not really dangerous for humans, yet in the end a child's hand is all it takes, none of the mobilized hunters pack.

6.title: Die Millionenkatze
6.plot: The Hansens get a prestigious, wealthy client: Waldau's major estate owner, Frau von Werther, brings I her beloved cat Nefertiti, after having poor Pawel fired as paperboy because the latest edition landed on the pillow-kept feline, waving Nelly's plea to reconsider. Shortly after, a masked intruder kidnaps the cat and demands 30.000 Euros ransom. Just then cousin Ariadne arrives, who advises to disregard the kids as suspect and simply pay up, but the ransom pickup is messed-up as they wrongly suspect the driver, who only came to keep an eye after he and the gardener ...

7.title: Der Wunderheiler
7.plot: Dr. Philip Hansen's surgery rapidly empties as his patients rush to the new 'animal healer' Edward Schellenberg, whose qualifications fit his sub-standard methods but whose suave way with customers lures them all, so Philip is tempted to accept an offer to run his Hamburg mentor's practice, which would require moving back. Pawel and Pauline find out and expose the quack's lethal trick.

8.title: Rinderwahn
8.plot: Mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber instructs Pawel's pa Tomasz Kulka to repair the cattle fence just over the border with grumpy neighbor farmer Mertz. Despite the Kulkas' due warning, he also jumps at the offer by Japanese outsider Nakamoto to buy his wagyu, the world's by far most expensive beef bovine, and accommodate it royally. Dr. Philip Hansen's mandatory veterinary examination however is tragic.

9.title: Fuchsjagd
9.plot: Vet Dr. Philip Hansen is tempted to move back to Hamburg, just now his family is settled in Waldau, to succeed his mentor as clinic boss, and professor Jasper Lüders even pays him a surprise visit to personally plead the post. Meanwhile chickens are killed by a wild fox, so farmers and kids start searching/ hunting, yet Pawel's gang sides with the vixen after finding her lair with cubs.

10.title: Trüffelschweine
10.plot: Employer Vinzenz Grieshaber, Pawel and his sister are dismayed when his father Tomasz Kulka barely agrees finishing some urgent pigsty chores before returning to Poland indefinitely to help Pawel's maternal grandparents after a fall. Pawel thinks up an alternative: earning money by training a truffle pig with Gustav's help but warned by the gamekeeper, even the admiring vet Dr. Philip Hansen must warn the knave for practical and legal problems.

11.title: Ausgesetzt!
11.plot: Raimund Singer arrives in town with his daughter Liz, her new stepmother Yasmin and an Italian stray dog, Pinocchio, which soon goes missing. Pawel's gang, must find out how it got in the shack of a contractor on mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber's land, bravely aided by veterinary assistant Bertie Heckenbichler, who goes undercover as 'logging applicant', while Dr. Philip Hansen worries about the non-vaccinated animal. The result determines who deserves to keep the canine, which proves relevant for brat custody too.

12.title: Goldesel
12.plot: Pawel's gang gets assistant vet Bertie Heckenbichler to help them, behind Dr. Hansens's back, to treat a neglected donkey who is bitten by the horses he's having to share a meadow with, but doc covers them. While the kids audition for the school play, mayor Vinzenz Grieshaber's unkind policy toward families and environment inspires the women, even his bossy wife Josefine to encourage Annette Hansen to stand as first female candidate against him.

13.title: Die Legende von Waldau
13.plot: While Bertus tells Pawel's gang a spooky campfire legend, they spot a mystery sound, alas from lumberjacks hired to clear the forest track for a housing project. *The gang abducts a former champion horse from Graetz's stud farm as she considered putting it down, and Pawel transforms it into a fake unicorn to counter the logging. The tourist and media impact makes it a major factor in the mayoral elections, with Vinzenz Grieshaber behind Annette Hansen in the polls.
